backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with all domain types for routines, scores, user profiles, utilities, and metrics across fasting, sleep, stress, training, and body composition.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records linking UI/UX enhancements to affected frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries of major frontend files describing their roles, themes, and functionality across the app.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML root document that mounts the React application and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up authentication flow, profile setup routing, legal disclaimer logic, and configures TanStack Router with global theme and layout.
frontend/src/components/AutophagyScoreIn: Modal component that displays detailed autophagy score breakdowns with multilingual labels, icons, ranges, and progress visuals.
frontend/src/components/BodyCompositionC: Displays body composition metrics with adjustable inputs and BMI indicators using color‑coded labels and presets.
frontend/src/components/ChecklistCard.ts: Renders a card with a list of checklist items, each with a checkbox, label, and optional description.
frontend/src/components/ChipsInput.tsx: Provides selectable preset buttons for numeric adjustments, emitting chosen values via onSelect.
Implements a canvas‑based circular dial for adjusting numeric values through drag interactions with visual gradients and ticks.
frontend/src/components/DailyCoachingCar: Shows daily coaching steps and insights with category‑colored badges and icons tailored to language preference.
frontend/src/components/EnergyCapsule.ts: Wraps content in a visual capsule that fills based on completion percentage and optional accent mode.
frontend/src/components/FastingTimer.tsx: Displays a fasting duration selector using a chronograph dial and shows feedback text based on selected hours.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer showing copyright text and a link to caffeine.ai with a heart icon.
frontend/src/components/FutureProjection: Presents three future‑projection panels (biological age, body form, energy/focus) with trend icons and multilingual text.
frontend/src/components/GradientSlider.t: Customizable slider with gradient background, optional scale labels, and luxury gold defaults.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: App header with navigation menu, token balance, settings, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/JournalCard.tsx: Journal entry manager allowing creation, editing, deletion, and display of timestamped entries.
frontend/src/components/LegalDisclaimerM: Modal showing a bilingual legal disclaimer with acknowledgment logic for first launch.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Login page using Internet Identity with branding, description, and feature icons.
frontend/src/components/NutritionCard.ts: Nutrition tracking card for protein, vegetables, and water with stepper and preset inputs.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: React form for creating a user profile with validation and submission via saveProfile mutation.
frontend/src/components/ScoreRing.tsx: Canvas-based circular score indicator with gradient arc and optional label/value display.
frontend/src/components/SettingsDialog.t: Dialog for editing and saving user profile settings, prefilled from user data with form validation.
frontend/src/components/SleepCard.tsx: Card UI for tracking sleep duration and quality using stepper and dial controls with language support.
frontend/src/components/SmartInsight.tsx: Displays a small insight card with an icon and message based on insight type.
frontend/src/components/SmartInsightsOve: Overlay that shows temporary motivational or warning messages based on score thresholds.
frontend/src/components/StepperInput.tsx: Numeric stepper with press-and-hold acceleration for incrementing or decrementing values.
frontend/src/components/StressCard.tsx: Renders a stress tracking card with inputs for systolic, diastolic, and pulse values and computes a color-coded status indicator.
frontend/src/components/SupplementCard.t: Manages a list of supplement entries with add, edit, delete, and completion toggle functionality, including form handling and sorting.
frontend/src/components/TokenWallet.tsx: Displays token balance, transactions, and transfer UI, with admin functions and integrations for identity, queries, and on‑chain actions.
frontend/src/components/TrainingCard.tsx: Allows users to add, view, and manage training sessions with types, duration, and intensity, and supports saving and loading sessions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user data, routines, scores, tokens, supplements, trainings, and journal entries via an actor API. Includes extensive cache invalidation across related queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS layers and custom theme variables for a dark luxury gold UI, plus utility classes for glass panels, shadows, gradients, and animated components.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AnalysisPage.tsx: Displays detailed health analytics using routines and body composition data, with charts, statistics, and a reset analysis feature.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main user dashboard aggregating routines, body metrics, supplements, trainings, and coaching insights, with many interactive cards and mutation handlers.
frontend/src/pages/JournalPage.tsx: Implements a journaling interface allowing creation, editing, and deletion of journal entries with language-aware messaging.
frontend/src/pages/WalletPage.tsx: Renders the LIV token wallet page showing blockchain-based token management and ecosystem features with localized text.
frontend/src/utils/dailyCoaching.ts: Generates prioritized daily coaching steps based on user routines and scores, producing actionable guidance across sleep, hydration, fasting, training, nutrition, and stress.
frontend/src/utils/dailyCoachingInsights: Creates short-form insights and warnings from current metrics and score trends, returning the top three most relevant messages.
frontend/src/utils/theme.ts: Defines gold‑jade themed gradient presets and helpers for score‑based color generation and background effects.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom gold/jade theme colors, shadows, radii, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including theme redesign goals, required assets, and high-level feature definitions.
